title: Overview of Datasets
text: Throughout datasets, ’ll see term units. Think unit 1 avocado. Hass Avocado Board (HAB) provides insights unit sales avocados. includes bags. terms bags, 1 unit still refers 1 avocado. bag (size) may consist multiple units.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: raw dataset provided HAB typically includes fractional units. imply fractions avocados sold. Rather, underlying data comes external sources. sources can provide fractional units depending count units. example, partial sales result fractional units. datasets package, values rounded nearest whole number. See HAB website summarized reports informational dashboards.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: product/price lookup code (PLU) uniquely identifies product (mainly produce). Hass Avocado Board focuses six different PLUs: 4046: non-organic small/medium Hass Avocados (~3-5 oz); also known Hass #60 size smaller 4225: non-organic large Hass Avocados (~8-10 oz); also known Hass #40 size Hass #48 size 4770: non-organic extra large Hass Avocados (~10-15 oz); also known Hass #36 size larger Organic avocados digit 9 prefixed non-organic PLUs: * 94046: organic small/medium Hass Avocados (~3-5 oz) * 94225: organic large Hass Avocados (~8-10 oz) * 94770: organic extra large Hass Avocados (~10-15 oz) Within dataset, ’ll want use type column combined column plu4046_units, plu4225_units, plu4770_units determine units conventional (non-organic) organic avocados. example, type Organic look value plu4046_units, ’ll actually looking unit sales organic avocados PLU 94046.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: Another distinction HAB makes bags versus bulk. Bulk typically means avocados sold individual pieces easily distinguishable PLU codes. Hence, PLU refers bulk sale. hand, bags indicates pre-packaged container consisting variable number avocados weigh differently.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: hass_region hass datasets contain shared variable called region hass dataset variable called location. Regions defined Hass Avocado Board Locations selected cities sub-regions part overall Region. totals found locations within Region equal total found specific Region due aforementioned point. convenience, breakdown Regions Locations: California Washington Oregon Idaho Nevada Montana Utah Arizona Wyoming Colorado New Mexico North Dakota South Dakota Nebraska Kansas Minnesota Iowa Missouri Texas Oklahoma Arkansas Louisiana Mississippi Alabama Georgia South Carolina Florida Kentucky Tennessee North Carolina West Virginia Virginia Maryland Delaware Wisconsin Illinois Michigan Indiana Ohio Pennsylvania New York Vermont New Hampshire Massachusetts Connecticut Rhode Island New Jersey Maine

title: Overview of Datasets
text: hass_usa dataset focuses weekly Hass Avocado sales country (.e., contiguous US) level consists following fields: week_ending: date last day week YYYY-MM-DD format. type: Whether ’s non-organic (Conventional) organic. avg_selling_price: Average Selling Price. derived value (HAB) looks total dollar sales divided total units sold. advertised selling price (e.g., price may see stores). total_bulk_and_bags_units: total number avocados sold. includes avocados sold individually (.e., bulk) bags. plu4046_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4046 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94046 ensure value type column Organic. plu4225_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4225 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94225 ensure value type column Organic. plu4770_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4770 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94770 ensure value type column Organic. total_bagged_units: total number avocados sold bags. number bags sold. sml_bagged_units: total number avocados sold small bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. lrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. xlrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold extra large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: hass_region dataset focuses weekly US Hass Avocado sales region level consist following fields: region: Specific region within US defined Hass Avocado Board. week_ending: date last day week YYYY-MM-DD format. type: Whether ’s non-organic (Conventional) organic. avg_selling_price: Average Selling Price. derived value (HAB) looks total dollar sales divided total units sold. advertised selling price (e.g., price may see stores). total_bulk_and_bags_units: total number avocados sold. includes avocados sold individually (.e., bulk) bags. plu4046_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4046 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94046 ensure value type column Organic. plu4225_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4225 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94225 ensure value type column Organic. plu4770_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4770 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94770 ensure value type column Organic. total_bagged_units: total number avocados sold bags. number bags sold. sml_bagged_units: total number avocados sold small bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. lrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. xlrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold extra large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards.

title: Overview of Datasets
text: hass_market dataset summarizes weekly Hass Avocado sales within contiguous US based city sub-region. areas defined HAB make portions region field haas_region dataset. fields : region: Specific region within US defined Hass Avocado Board. market: market within specified region United States. market typically represents major metropolitan city (cities) reporting highest sales. week_ending: date last day week YYYY-MM-DD format. type: Whether ’s non-organic (Conventional) organic. avg_selling_price: Average Selling Price. derived value (HAB) looks total dollar sales divided total units sold. advertised selling price (e.g., price may see stores). total_bulk_and_bags_units: total number avocados sold. includes avocados sold individually (.e., bulk) bags. plu4046_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4046 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94046 ensure value type column Organic. plu4225_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4225 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94225 ensure value type column Organic. plu4770_units: total number avocados sold. non-organic, consider PLU 4770 ensure value tpe column Conventional. organic, consider PLU 94770 ensure value type column Organic. total_bagged_units: total number avocados sold bags. number bags sold. sml_bagged_units: total number avocados sold small bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. lrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards. xlrg_bagged_units: total number avocados sold extra large bags. value longer available 2021 onwards.

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: {avocado} package provides summary weekly Hass avocado sales contiguous United States. underlying data Hass Avocado Board (free registration required). Hass Avocados popular variety avocados sold United States Haas Avocado Board (HAB) provides crucial data growers marketers. HAB makes information available anyone may interested (free registration required). important note remember term ‘units’ typically refers 1 avocado. refer avocados terms weight, bags, etc. HAB provide (least publicly) actual piece-count sales retailers consumers.

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: {avocadoo} package consists 3 primary PLUs: 4046: non-organic small/medium Hass Avocados (~3-5 oz); also known Hass #60 size smaller 4225: non-organic large Hass Avocados (~8-10 oz); also known Hass #40 size Hass #48 size 4770: non-organic extra large Hass Avocados (~10-15 oz); also known Hass #36 size larger Organic avocados digit 9 prefixed non-organic PLUs: 94046: organic small/medium Hass Avocados (~3-5 oz) 94225: organic large Hass Avocados (~8-10 oz) 94770: organic extra large Hass Avocados (~10-15 oz) Source: Love One Today

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: HAB also tracks avocado sales bags varying sizes. Since 2021, HAB break units avocados sold bag size (e.g., small, large, extra large). Bags can consist multiple avocados can weights bags can vary. See vignette information.

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: Install development version GitHub:

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: {avocado} package consists three different datasets: hass_usa: weekly contiguous US avocado sales country level hass_region: weekly contiguous US avocado sales region level hass_market: weekly contiguous US avocado sales city/sub-region (.e., market) level

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: hass_market dataset provides weekly sales summary Hass Avocado sales contiguous US (subdivided region select cites/sub-regions within ‘parent’ region):

title: Weekly Hass Avocado Sales Summary
text: potential use cases include: Determining peak sale periods market Determining PLU popular major cities (e.g., Chicago, Los Angeles, etc.) Differences organic non-organic Hass Avocados

title: Hass Avocado Market Sales — hass_market
text: Weekly summary Hass avocado sales specific markets found within regions United States

title: Hass Avocado Market Sales — hass_market
text: dataframe 13 variables region region United States. Defined Hass Avocado Board reporting. region may consist multiple markets found different states. See Hass Avocado Board website details. market market within specified region United States. market typically represents major metropolitan city (cities) reporting highest sales. week_ending date last day week YYYY-MM-DD format. type Whether avocado type conventional (meaning non-organic) organic. avg_selling_price average selling price (advertised selling price) US$ Hass avocados. adjusted inflation. total_bulk_and_bags_units number avocados sold bulk (.e., individually) bags. unit 1 avocado - 1 bag. plu4046_units amount number PLU4046 (non-organic) PLU94046 (organic) Hass avocados sold. Use type column determine units non-organic organic avocados. plu4225_units amount number PLU4225 (non-organic) PLU94225 (organic) Hass avocados sold. Use type column determine units non-organic organic avocados. plu4770_units amount number PLU4770 (non-organic) PLU94770 (organic) Hass avocados sold. Use type column determine units non-organic organic avocados. total_bagged_units amount avocados sold bags. One unit refers one avocado, 1 bag. 2021 onwards, value broken size bag. sml_bagged_units amount avocados sold small bags. One unit refers one avocado. bag typically consists Hass #60 sizes & smaller. lrg_bagged_units amount avocados sold large bags. One unit refers one avocado. bag typically consists Hass #40 & Hass #48 sizes. xlrg_bagged_units TThe amount avocados sold extra large bags. One unit refers one avocado. bag typically consists Hass #36 sizes larger.

text: dataset contains weekly sales summary Hass avocados locations within regions (defined Hass Avocado Board) US.
